Load libraries
```{r}
library(readr)
library(data.table)
library(tm)
```

Read in data
```{r}
myURL <- "https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/dsscapstone/dataset/Coursera-SwiftKey.zip"
 
dateDownloaded <- date()
 
 if(!file.exists("rawdata.zip")){
     download.file(myURL, destfile = "rawdata.zip", method = "curl")
     unzip("rawdata.zip")
}
```

Define readin function
```{r}
readin <- function(file_path, lang) {
  new_file <- VCorpus(DirSource(file_path),
                     readerControl = list(reader = readPlain,
                                          language = lang,
                                          load = TRUE
                                          )
  )
  new_file
}
```

Read in data
```{r}
en_corp <- readin("~/CapstoneProject/final/en_US", "en_US")
de_corp <- readin("~/CapstoneProject/final/de_DE", "de_DE")
fi_corp <- readin("~/CapstoneProject/final/fi_FI", "fi_FI")
ru_corp <- readin("~/CapstoneProject/final/ru_RU", "ru_RU")

corp <- c(en_corp, de_corp, fi_corp, ru_corp)
rm(en_corp, de_corp, fi_corp, ru_corp)
```
